Introduction
This topic contains general information on VR&E services, including
services provided by Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Service
special programs for unemployable Veterans
time period during which a rehabilitation program must be completed
, and
payment to Veterans who participate in a training program
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Eligibility
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
